name: Sorcery101 - Easy nav
description: Another crude solution - the lower nav bar is moved to the top left, with a gray background.

user.name: Cyberman tM
user.about:
Any styles I upload are first and foremost written for myself - they're crude, they're not refined, and I haven't really tested them outside the browser I'm currently using. If there's a problem, feel free to fix it.

They'are all based on the assumption that you want to read the archive without having to look for the "next" button each time. I'm using a wireless mouse, so it's nice to sit back and just click without first moving around.
